name: mri_volsynth
description: Synthesizes a volume with specified geometry and probability distribution function.
author: FreeSurfer Developers

inputs.description: Output volume path id and format
inputs.name: Output volume

inputs.description: Template volume id
inputs.name: Template

inputs.description: Override template number of frames
inputs.name: Number of frames

inputs.description: Use template as intensity offset
inputs.name: Offset flag

inputs.description: Use middle frame of template as intensity offset
inputs.name: Offset mid flag

inputs.description: Save output as curvature, uses lh.thickness as template. Requires subject and hemisphere.
inputs.name: Curvature output

inputs.description: Specify dimensionality nc nr ns nf
inputs.name: Dimensions

inputs.description: Voxel resolution dc dr ds df (df is TR, in msec)
inputs.name: Resolution

inputs.description: Change template voxel resolution and dimension dc dr ds
inputs.name: Voxel size

inputs.description: Time between frames in msec
inputs.name: Time between frames

inputs.description: Column cosine direction x, y, z
inputs.name: Column Cosine Direction

inputs.description: Row cosine direction x, y, z
inputs.name: Row Cosine Direction

inputs.description: Slice cosine direction x, y, z
inputs.name: Slice Cosine Direction

inputs.description: RAS coordinates of 'center' voxel c_r c_a c_s
inputs.name: RAS Center Voxel

inputs.description: First voxel coordinates p0r p0a p0s
inputs.name: First voxel

inputs.description: Precision of the output (e.g., float)
inputs.name: Precision

inputs.description: Seed for the random number generator
inputs.name: Seed

inputs.description: Write seed value to this file
inputs.name: Seed file

inputs.description: Probability distribution function (e.g., gaussian, uniform, const)
inputs.name: PDF

inputs.description: Bounding box c r s dc dr ds (In=ValA, Out=ValB)
inputs.name: Bounding box

inputs.description: Mean for the gaussian distribution
inputs.name: Gaussian mean

inputs.description: Standard deviation for the gaussian distribution
inputs.name: Gaussian stddev

inputs.description: Delta's col, row, slice, and frame coordinates
inputs.name: Delta CRSF

inputs.description: Delta value
inputs.name: Delta Value

inputs.description: Delta background value
inputs.name: Delta Background Value

inputs.description: Grid dimensions dcol, drow, dslice
inputs.name: Grid

inputs.description: Degrees of freedom for t and chi2 distributions
inputs.name: Degrees of freedom

inputs.description: Numerator degrees of freedom for F distribution
inputs.name: Numerator DOF

inputs.description: Denominator degrees of freedom for F distribution
inputs.name: Denominator DOF

inputs.description: Rescale z, t, F, or chi2 after smoothing
inputs.name: Rescale flag

inputs.description: Set ValA
inputs.name: ValA

inputs.description: Set ValB
inputs.name: ValB

inputs.description: Radius in voxels for sphere
inputs.name: Voxel Radius

inputs.description: Radius in mm for sphere
inputs.name: MM Radius

inputs.description: Sphere center coordinates column, row, slice
inputs.name: Sphere Center

inputs.description: Multiply each frame by a random number between min and max
inputs.name: HSC Range

inputs.description: Compute absolute value
inputs.name: Absolute value flag

inputs.description: Set control point voxels to 1
inputs.name: Control Points

inputs.description: Set all values at a given time point to 1e9
inputs.name: Spike Time Point

inputs.description: Smooth by Full Width at Half Maximum (FWHM) in mm
inputs.name: FWHM

inputs.description: Save sum of volume squared into specified file
inputs.name: Sum Volume Squared

inputs.description: Set dimension to nvertices x 1 x 1
inputs.name: Surface Dimension Flag

inputs.description: Embed color table
inputs.name: Color Table
